title: Unlucky
body: Is all of getting into the PBE luck? i signed up like three or four years ago and i haven't gotten an account, maybe I'm just unlucky xD.

replies.body: Thanks Longstrike1!  While PBE is in maintenance, no acceptance notifications are being sent out.  Bookmark the status page and hang tight!
From the information I gather from the [PBE Server Status](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) page, PBE signups are closed for maintenance. With no ETA of its return.
